name: Thalassemia And Sicklecell Society
briefDescription: Thalassemia & Sickle Cell Society (TSCS) was established (1998) in the city of Hyderabad to promote appropriate treatment and to achieve a good quality of life for every thalassemia affected Child. Our Vision•	To reduce number of New Born Thalassemia patients in and around Hyderabad by educating, counseling and training.•	Improve the health of already affected Thalassemia patients and prolonging their life by giving free blood transfusion, free health checkup and regular counseling  It is the only place in Andhra Pradesh wherein a Transfusion Center with attached Blood Bank is managing the treatment of blood disorders - Thalassemia & Sickle Cell anemia in Hyderabad. Our objective is to increase the life expectancy and enhance the quality of lives of all those 1300 patients coming regularly to us.
